__TOC__



This page will outline the focus of the Advocacy effort of the North Carolina LoCo Team for 2010.  

This page will be a dynamic planning/recording device to lock in and hone ideas as they develop.

''For more information regarding the use of this page, contact <nowiki>[[JohnGhormley|John Ghormley]]</nowiki> (jcg2)''

== Plan Of Action for Rural Expansion ==
* Is there a LUG in or near city?
** Yes
*** Contact LUG
*** Develop supportive, working relationship with LUG
*** Make presentation to LUG re LoCo activities & membership
*** Add identified Ubuntu users/converts to area mailing list
** No
*** Advertise for Linux users
**** Craigslist
**** LoCo Mailing List
**** Contact area colleges/Computer Science Department
**** Contact area high schools/Career & Technical Ed Depts
* Identify two to three potential members
* Encourage LoCo participation thru targeted mailing list for area
* Establish Ubuntu Hour in city
* Promote LoCo membership
* Promote regional team involvement
** Stress participation in Loco meetings
** Establish Regional team meetings
